name: KING
description: A good reputation still won't change the inability to get by with an empty wallet, so let's fill it up first and ask questions later.

set.set_2: When a target is shattered, grant **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**14%** damage boost for **25** seconds. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.set_4: If there are **2** or more enemies nearby, attacks restore HP equal to **14%**/**18%**/**22%**/**26%** of the damage dealt, up to **36%**/**42%**/**48%**/**54%** of ATK every **0.5** seconds.
